casebody.data:
ACRO SERVICE CORPORATION, Plaintiff,
v.
NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF PURCHASE AND PROPERTY, Defendant-Movant,
and
22nd Century Technologies, Inc., Defendants. M-248 September Term 2018
081310 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 2, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for an extension of time within which to file an answering brief is granted.
